Nodes.Text: But man rose up against us
For centuries, hidden away in darkness
Destroys all objects, units and items in a large area.
Apply a shield to target ally or self that shields the target for <skillcolor>{absorb}</c> of your spell power. Knocks nearby enemies back when the shield is applied.

Summon a pillar of blood healing allies for <skillcolor>{healing}</c> of your spell power. The pillar erupts after <skillcolor>{delay}s</c> inflicting <blood>Leech</c> and dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage to enemies while healing allies for <skillcolor>{healing2}</c> of your spell power.

Heal nearby allies for <skillcolor>{healing}</c> of your spell power, increase attack speed by <skillcolor>{attackspeed}</c> and movement speed by <skillcolor>{hastefactor}</c> for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Inflicts <blood>Leech</c> on nearby enemies.

Block melee and projectile attacks for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Blocking an attack triggers a wave of energy that pushes enemies away, dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicting <blood>Leech</c>. Turn immaterial for <skillcolor>{immaterialduration}s</c> when this effect triggers.

Channel a beam of energy that deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicts <blood>Leech</c> to enemies hit while healing allies for <skillcolor>{healing}</c> of your spell power per second for up to <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Each target hit heals self for <skillcolor>{selfhealing}</c> of your spell power.
Effect that deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage to you and all nearby allies upon expiration

Dash forward and strike enemies in a line. Deals <skillcolor>{dotdamage}</c> magic damage and heals self for <skillcolor>{dothealing}</c> of your spell power over <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. A nova of blood erupts when the effect ends dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicting <blood>Leech</c> to the victim and nearby enemies.

Launch a projectile that deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage, drains <skillcolor>{leech}</c> health and inflicts <blood>Leech</c>. Heals ally hit for <skillcolor>{spellpower}</c> and self for <skillcolor>{selfhealing}</c> of your spell power. Hitting an enemy affected by <blood>Leech</c> consumes the effect and heals you for <skillcolor>{healing}</c> of your maximum health.
Launch a projectile that deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicts <blood>Leech</c>.

Dash towards input direction and elude nearby enemies for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Your next primary attack deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> bonus damage, heals you for <skillcolor>{healing}</c> of your maximum health and inflicts <blood>Leech</c>.
<blood>Leech</c> the lifeforce from your enemies for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Physical attacks restore <skillcolor>{leechfactor}</c> of damage dealt against <blood>Leeched</c> enemies.
Mastery of blood is the innate power residing in all vampires. The sanguine arts pull the lifeforce from your enemies, turning their blood and pain into your nourishment.
The eruption hit consumes <blood>Leech</c> dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage.
The initial impact inflicts a fading snare lasting <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
Increases healing of the initial hit by <skillcolor>{Healing}%</c>.
Removes all negative effects from self and nearby allies on the initial hit.

<skillcolor>Recast</c> to conjure a lesser blood fountain. The initial hit heals allies for <skillcolor>{InitHealing}%</c>, the eruption hit heals for <skillcolor>{ImpactHealing}%</c> and deals <skillcolor>{Damage}% damage</c>.
Increases healing of the eruption impact by <skillcolor>{Healing}%</c>.
The eruption hit knocks enemies back <skillcolor>{Range}</c> meters.
The eruption hit increases target ally movement speed by <skillcolor>{MovementSpeedModifier}%</c> for <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
Increases physical damage output by <skillcolor>{PhysicalDamage}%</c> during the effect.
Killing an enemy unit during the effect heals you for <skillcolor>{Healing}%</c> of your maximum health.
Shield self and nearby allies for <skillcolor>{Shield}%</c> of your spell power.
Inflicts a fading snare on enemies hit lasting <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
When triggered, consumes <blood>Leech</c> from up to <skillcolor>{Count}</c> targets, healing self for <skillcolor>{Healing}%</c> of your maximum health per target.
When triggered, consumes <blood>Leech</c> from up to <skillcolor>{Count}</c> targets, reducing cooldown by <skillcolor>{CooldownReduction}s</c> per target.
When triggered your next primary attack used within <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c> deals <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> bonus damage.
Turn invisible during the immaterial duration.
Bounces towards an additional target after first hit dealing <skillcolor>{Modifier}%</c> of the initial damage or healing. Can bounce back towards owner.
Consumes <blood>Leech</c> on hit, dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> bonus damage.
Consumes <blood>Leech</c> on hit. healing self for <skillcolor>{Healing}%</c> of your maximum health.
Explodes on hit dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and inflicting <blood>Leech</c> on nearby enemies.
Forks into two lesser projectiles on hit, each projectile dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and inflicting <blood>Leech</c>.
Next primary attack inflicts a fading snare lasting <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
Next primary attack conjures a nova of blood dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and inflicting <blood>Leech</c> on nearby enemies.
Next attack consumes <blood>Leech</c> increasing your physical damage output by <skillcolor>{Factor}%</c> for <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
Smash the ground, causing a shockwave that erupts, dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage in a line and inflicting <chaos>Ignite</c>.
Launch <skillcolor>4</c> Chaos Orbs that deal <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage on direct hit, <skillcolor>{damage2}</c> magic damage to enemies in an area and inflicts <chaos>Ignite</c>.

Block melee and projectile attacks in front of you for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Blocking an attack launches a projectile towards the attacker dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> damage, pulling the target towards you and inflicting <chaos>Ignite</c>.\n\n<skillcolor>Recast</c> during the effect to launch a chaos projectile.

Charge forward and grab an enemy dealing <skillcolor>{HitDamage}</c> magic damage, and push them in front of you. Deals <skillcolor>{AreaDamage}</c> magic area damage, inflicts <chaos>Ignite</c> and inflicts a <skillcolor>Stun</c> lasting <skillcolor>{StunDuration}s</c> when reaching maximum range or when colliding with another enemy or object.

Boost a target ally or self. Increases movement speed by <skillcolor>{hastefactor}</c>, attack speed by <skillcolor>{attackspeed}</c> and physical attacks inflict <chaos>Ignite</c> for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>.

Dash towards input direction and elude nearby enemies for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Your next primary attack inflicts <chaos>Ignite</c> and your illusion explode, dealing <skillcolor>{damage2}</c> magic damage to nearby enemies and inflicting <chaos>Ignite</c>.\n\nCan be <skillcolor>recasted</c> to dash once more.
Summon an orb that explodes at the target location, dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage, inflicting <chaos>Ignite</c> and pulls enemies towards the center.
Launch <skillcolor>2</c> Chaos Bolts in a sequence that deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicts <chaos>Ignite</c>.
<chaos>Ignite</c> your enemies with chaos flames, dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage over <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>.
The flames of the void cannot be quenched. Their crackling energies incinerate your enemies and push you beyond your limits with surges of void power.
The initial wave inflicts a fading snare on enemies hit lasting <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
Knocks nearby enemies back <skillcolor>{Range}</c> meters on cast.
Launch three lesser projectiles in an arc instead of one when recasting, each lesser projectile deals <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> of the original damage.
Projectiles forks into two lesser projectiles on hit, each projectile dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and inflicting <chaos>Ignite</c>.
Absorbing a melee attack stuns the attacker for <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
Hitting a different target with the second projectile deals <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> additional damage.
Shield target for <skillcolor>{Shield}%</c> of your spell power.
Increases physical damage output by <skillcolor>{Factor}%</c> during the effect.
<skillcolor>Recast</c> to consume the effect triggering an explosion dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and pulling enemies towards the target.
Lethal attacks during the effect reduce cooldown by <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>. Can trigger up to <skillcolor>{Count}</c> times.
Inflicts a fading snare lasting <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c> when an illusion explodes.
Increases damage done when an illusion explodes by <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c>.
Spawns a second illusion when recasting dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> of the original damage.
Flames engulf the area dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage up to <skillcolor>{Count}</c> times to enemies in the area.
Spawns <skillcolor>{Count}</c> exploding fragments dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and inflicting <chaos>Ignite</c>.
Increases the rate charges recharge by <skillcolor>{ChargeUpRate}%</c>.

Leap into the air and strike down at target location, dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage. A nova of frost erupts from the impact location, <frost>Freezing</c> any enemy hit for up to <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>.\n\nEnemy vampires are frozen for <skillcolor>{vampireduration}s</c>.

Block melee and projectile attacks in front of you for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Conjures up to <skillcolor>{count}</c> frost spikes dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicting <frost>Chill</c> when the barrier is struck.\n\n<skillcolor>Recast</c> during the effect to conjure a cone of cold dealing <skillcolor>{conedamage}</c> magical damage and inflicting <frost>Chill</c>.
Launch a projectile dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicting <frost>Freeze</c> lasting <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>.

Launch a projectile that that deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage. The projectile explodes upon impact, inflicting <frost>Chill</c> on nearby enemies. Hitting a <frost>chilled</c> enemy <frost>freezes</c>  it for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>.

Conjure a frost storm that deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and pulls enemies towards the center. The storm rages on for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>, dealing <skillcolor>{dps}</c> magic damage and inflicting <frost>Chill</c> on all enemies.

Apply a shield to target ally or self that shields the target for <skillcolor>{absorb}</c> of your spell power. The effect leaves a frost trail behind that deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage every <skillcolor>{tick}s</c> and inflicts <frost>Chill</c> on enemies that pass through it.

Turn target ally or self into solid ice rendering them unable to move or act for up to <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. The ice shields for <skillcolor>{absorb}</c> of your spell power, grants immunity to crowd control effects and heals up to <skillcolor>{healing}</c> of maximum health while active.\n\nThe effect can be canceled by <skillcolor>interrupting</c> it.
Conjure a nova of ice at the target location dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage. The nova radiates outward inflicting <frost>Chill</c>.
Creates frost spikes at target location dealing {damage} magic damage and inflicts Chill on enemies hit.

Dash towards input direction, elude nearby enemies for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Your next primary attack conjures a nova of frost dealing <skillcolor>{areadamage}</c> magic damage and inflicting <frost>Chill</c> on nearby enemies.
<frost>Chill</c> your enemies to their core, slowing their movement speed by <skillcolor>{slowfactor}</c> for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>.

<frost>Freezes</c> your enemies solid, making them unable to move or act for <skillcolor>{freezeduration}s</c>.

Deals <skillcolor>{frostdamage}</c> spell damage and inflicts <frost>Chill</c> if enemy is immune to <frost>Freeze</c>.

<i>Vampires are frozen for <skillcolor>half duration</c>.
Command the frigid winds of blizzards and hailstorms, slowly freezing your foes into frosted sculptures of horrid cold or impaling them on spikes of ice.
Increases <frost>freeze</c> duration by <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c> when hitting a <frost>chilled</c> target.
Pierces up to <skillcolor>{Count}</c> targets dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> reduced damage per target.
Absorbing an attack increases your spell power by <skillcolor>{SpellPower}%</c> for <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>. Effect stacks up to <skillcolor>{Count}</c> times.
Cone of cold knocks targets back <skillcolor>{Range}</c> meters on hit.
Hitting a <frost>chilled</c> or <frost>frozen</c> target with the cone of cold shields you for <skillcolor>{Shield}%</c> of your spell power.
The frost impact blast deals <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage to surrounding enemies.
Absorbs an additional <skillcolor>{Absorb}%</c> of your spell power.
Charges target's weapon with arctic energy. Next primary attack deals <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> bonus damage and inflicts <frost>Chill</c>.
Inflicts <frost>Chill</c> on enemy attackers dealing physical damage to you.
The nova shields self and allies for <skillcolor>{Shield}%</c> of your spell power.
<skillcolor>Recast</c> to conjure a lesser ice nova dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> of the original damage.
Illusion explodes in a nova of ice dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and inflicting <frost>Chill</c> on nearby enemies.
Inflicts a fading snare on enemies hit lasting <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
Knock targets back <skillcolor>{Range}</c> meters on hit.
Increases damage of next primary attack by <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c>.
Consumes <chaos>Ignite</c> and triggers an explosion dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> area damage.
Next primary attack consumes <chaos>Ignite</c> and triggers an explosion dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> area damage.
Consumes <chaos>Ignite</c> increasing your movement speed by <skillcolor>{Factor}%</c> for <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>. Effect stacks up to <skillcolor>2</c> times.
Next primary attack consumes <chaos>Ignite</c> increasing your movement speed by <skillcolor>{Factor}%</c> for <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>. Effect stacks up to <skillcolor>2</c> times.
Removes all negative effects from self when cast.
Conjure a nova of ice inflicting <frost>Chill</c> or consuming <frost>Chill</c>, inflicting <frost>Freeze</c> lasting <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c> when the effect ends.
Next primary attack consumes <frost>Chill</c> and inflicts <frost>Freeze</c> lasting <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
Cone of cold consumes <frost>Chill</c> and inflicts <frost>Freeze</c> lasting <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
Increases damage done to <frost>chilled</c> and <frost>frozen</c> targets by <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c>.
Hitting a <frost>chilled</c> or <frost>frozen</c> target shields you for <skillcolor>{Shield}%</c> of your spell power.
Hitting a <frost>chilled</c> or <frost>frozen</c> target shatters the projectile into <skillcolor>{Count}</c> splinters, each dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and inflicting <frost>Chill</c>.
Consumes <illusion>Weaken</c> to gain a shield absorbing <skillcolor>{Shield}%</c> damage based on your spell power stacking up to <skillcolor>3</c> times.
Next primary attack consumes <illusion>Weaken</c> to gain a shield absorbing <skillcolor>{Shield}%</c> damage based on your spell power stacking up to <skillcolor>3</c> times.
Consumes <illusion>Weaken</c> from enemies near the destination to gain a shield absorbing <skillcolor>{Shield}%</c> damage based on your spell power stacking up to <skillcolor>3</c> times.
Consumes <illusion>Weaken</c> from up to <skillcolor>{Count}</c> targets, reducing cooldown by <skillcolor>{CooldownReduction}s</c> per target.
Consumes <illusion>Weaken</c> to spawn a wisp healing self or ally for <skillcolor>{Healing}%</c> of your spell power.
Increases the duration of the effect by <skillcolor>{Factor}%</c>.
Increases movement speed when channeling by <skillcolor>{Factor}%</c>.
Increases projectile range and speed by <skillcolor>{Factor}%</c>.
The recast attack knocks targets back <skillcolor>{Range}</c> meters on hit.
Absorbing an attack reduces cooldown by <skillcolor>{CooldownReduction}s</c> from up to <skillcolor>{Count}</c> attacks.
Consumes <storm>Static</c> to stun the target for <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
Consumes <storm>Static</c> to stun enemies for <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c> when the orb explodes.
Consumes <storm>Static</c> to charge your weapon up to <skillcolor>{Count}</c> times. Next primary attack deals <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> bonus damage per stack and inflicts <storm>Static</c>.
Hitting an enemy already affected by <unholy>Condemn</c> inflicts <unholy>Agony</c> which deals <skillcolor>{DamagePerTick}%</c> damage <skillcolor>{Ticks}</c> times over the duration.

Next primary attack inflicts <unholy>Agony</c> if the enemy was already affected by <unholy>Condemn</c>. <unholy>Agony</c> deals <skillcolor>{DamagePerTick}%</c> damage <skillcolor>{Ticks}</c> times over the duration.

Hitting an enemy already affected by <unholy>Condemn</c> inflicts <unholy>Bane</c>. \nWhen an enemy affected by <unholy>Bane</c> dies, summon a skeleton mage with <skillcolor>{BonusStats}%</c> extra health.

Next primary attack inflicts <unholy>Bane</c> if the enemy was already affected by <unholy>Condemn</c>. \nWhen an enemy affected by <unholy>Bane</c> dies, summon a skeleton mage with <skillcolor>{BonusStats}%</c> extra health.

Block melee and projectile attacks for up to <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Turn immaterial and teleport to cursor location when an attack is blocked. Inflicts <illusion>Weaken</c> on nearby enemies when reappearing and grants <illusion>Phantasm</c> for each enemy hit.

Summon a Spectral Guardian that shields allies in an area for <skillcolor>{smallabsorb}</c> of your spell power and inflicts <illusion>Weaken</c> on nearby enemies. The guardian attacks enemies with a mighty swing dealing <skillcolor>{golemdamage}</c> magic damage. The shield is reapplied every <skillcolor>{tickduration}s</c> and the guardian lasts for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>.

Dash forward and bounce between nearby enemies striking them for a total of <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage split across targets within the area and inflicting <skillcolor>Haunt</c> over <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Afterward, dash towards your aim direction. Hitting an enemy affected by <skillcolor>Haunt</c> consumes the effect and triggers <skillcolor>Soul Harvest</c>. \n\n<skillcolor>Recast</c> to end this effect early.

Summon a spectral mosquito at target location that explodes after <skillcolor>{duration}s</c> dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage in an area, inflicting <illusion>Weaken</c> and <skillcolor>fearing</c> enemies for up to <skillcolor>{fearduration}s</c>. Grants <illusion>Phantasm</c> for each enemy hit.

Apply a shield to target ally or self that shields the target for <skillcolor>{absorb}</c> of your spell power, inflicts <illusion>Weaken</c> on nearby enemies and grants <illusion>Phantasm</c> for each enemy hit.
Summon ghosts at target location that deals {damage} magic damage and inflict panic on all enemies hit that last for {duration}s.

Summon a Spectral Assassin at target location that performs a heavy melee attack dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back and inflicting <skillcolor>Haunt</c>. Hitting an enemy affected by <skillcolor>Haunt</c> consumes the effect and triggers <skillcolor>Soul Harvest</c>. The Spectral Assassin lasts for up to <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>.

Dash towards input direction and elude nearby enemies for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Your next primary attack deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> bonus damage and inflicts <illusion>Weaken</c>. Spawns an illusion that launches projectiles inflicting <illusion>Weaken</c> and granting <illusion>Phantasm</c>.\n\n<skillcolor>Recast</c> to return to your start position and spawn a new illusion at your current location.

Summon three wisps that circle around you, dealing <skillcolor>{orbitdamage}</c> magic damage and inflicting <illusion>Weaken</c> to enemies and granting <illusion>Phantasm</c>.\n\n<skillcolor>Recast</c> to launch all three wisps as piercing projectiles dealing <skillcolor>{projectiledamage}</c> magic damage, inflicting <illusion>Weaken</c> and granting <illusion>Phantasm</c>.

Send out a Spectral wolf that bounces to a nearby enemy after each hit, up to <skillcolor>{count}</c> additonal hits. Deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage on the first hit, subsequent hits deal <skillcolor>{damagereduction}</c> damage of the previous hit. Each hit inflicts <illusion>Weaken</c> and grants a stack of <illusion>Phantasm</c>.

Dash backward and launch a piercing projectile dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicting <illusion>Weaken</c>. Each subsequent hit deals <skillcolor>{damagereduction}</c> damage of the previous hit and grants <illusion>Phantasm</c>.

<illusion>Weaken</c> your enemy to reduce their damage output by <skillcolor>{weakenfactor}</c> for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. <skillcolor>{chance}%</c> chance to gain <illusion>Phantasm</c> whenever a <illusion>weakened</c> target perish.

Reduces your spell cooldowns by <skillcolor>{cooldownreduction}</c> and grants <skillcolor>{freecastchance}</c> chance to reset cooldown on cast. This effect stacks up to <skillcolor>{stacks}</c> times and is removed once you successfully reset cooldown on cast.
Enter the mind of your enemies, sowing confusion and haunting them with visions of specters and apparitions. Those that donâ€™t flee will be too weak to fight back.
When triggered fears nearby enemies around you for <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
When triggered increases movement speed by <skillcolor>{Factor}%</c> for <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
When triggered reduces the cooldown of your secondary weapon skill by <skillcolor>{Factor}%</c>.
Increases mosquito maximum health by <skillcolor>{Health}%</c> and movement speed by <skillcolor>{Speed}%</c>.
Shields nearby allies for <skillcolor>{Shield}%</c> of your spell power when the mosquito is summoned.
Spawns <skillcolor>{Count}</c> wisps healing self or ally for <skillcolor>{Healing}%</c> of your spell power when the mosquito explodes.
<skillcolor>Recast</c> to consume the barrier from an allied target pulling the ally towards you.
Consumes <illusion>Weaken</c> from nearby enemies inflicting fear lasting <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
The barrier explodes upon expire dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and inflicting <illusion>Weaken</c> on nearby enemies.
Increases target spell power by <skillcolor>{SpellPower}%</c> while the barrier last.
Consumes <illusion>Weaken</c> on hit, granting <skillcolor>{Stacks}</c> stacks of <illusion>Phantasm</c>.
Reduces damage penalty per bounce by <skillcolor>{DamageIncrease}%</c>.
Initial projectile inflicts a fading snare on enemies hit lasting <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
The wolf returns to you after the last bounce, healing for <skillcolor>{Healing}%</c> of your spell power.
Next primary attack inflicts a fading snare lasting <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
Next primary attack grants <skillcolor>{Stacks}</c> stacks of <illusion>Phantasm</c>.
Detonate your illusion dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and inflicting <illusion>weaken</c> in an area on recast.
Damage penalty per hit is reduced by <skillcolor>{Reduction}%</c>.
Hitting an ally shields them for <skillcolor>{Shield}%</c> of your spell power.

Launch a Ball Lightning that lingers in place, periodically shocking a nearby enemy inflicting <storm>Static</c>. Deals up to <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage per target over <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Ball Lightning's total damage cannot exceed <skillcolor>{multtargetdamage}</c> magic damage. \n\nExplodes after the duration dealing <skillcolor>{areadamage}</c> magic damage in the area.

Conjure a cyclone that pierces enemies dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicting <storm>Static</c>. The cyclone returns once it reaches max distance, circling back towards you and lingering for up to <skillcolor>{duration}s</c> hitting any enemy it passes through.

Block melee and projectile attacks for up to <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Turn immaterial and travel to cursor location when an attack is blocked. Passing through an enemy deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage, inflicts <storm>Static</c> and launches the target into the air for <skillcolor>{airduration}s</c>.

Knockback nearby enemies and conjure a thunderstorm around you. Lightning bolts strike down in the surrounding area dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicts <storm>Static</c>. The storm rages on for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c> and lightning strikes the area <skillcolor>{count}</c> times over the duration.

Summon a curtain of lightning that blocks projectiles for up to <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Inflicts <storm>Static</c> and periodically deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage to enemies that pass through the effect. Applies a fading haste increasing movement speed by <skillcolor>{movespeed}</c> for <skillcolor>{moveduration}s</c> to allies that passes through.

Launch a projectile that deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicts <storm>Static</c>. You and the other target swap locations on impact.\n\nIf the target is immune to the effect you instead teleport to the location of the target.

Dash forward and bounce between nearby enemies striking them for a total of <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage split across targets within the area over <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Additionally strikes all enemies in the area up to <skillcolor>{count}</c> times dealing <skillcolor>{lightningdamage}</c> magic damage and inflicting <storm>Static</c>. Afterward, dash towards your aim direction.\n\n<skillcolor>Attack</c> to end this effect early.

Launch a projectile that pierces up to <skillcolor>3</c> targets,  deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicts <storm>Static</c>. Hitting an enemy affected by <storm>Static</c> consumes the effect and silences the target.
Launch a projectile that deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and launches the target into the air for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>.

Dash towards input direction and elude nearby enemies for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Gain <skillcolor>{attackrate}</c> increased attack speed for <skillcolor>{attackrateduration}s</c>. Your next primary attack deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> bonus damage and inflicts <storm>Static</c>. Dashing through an enemy also inflicts <storm>Static</c>.
Electrify your enemy for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c> causing physical damage dealt to them to trigger a shock dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage.
Harness lightning and thunder to lay waste to your foes. Become electricity itself, crackling between your enemies while you bring down the full fury of the storm.
<skillcolor>Recast</c> to detonate the orb early. The explosion deals <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> increased damage.

By accessing a <teal2>Level {level} Enemy Castle Heart</c> you may spend <skillcolor>Level {level} Castle Keys</c> to trigger different actions.

<teal2>Disable Defences</c>
Spend <skillcolor>{countdisable} Key</c> to disable enemy walls, doors, waygates and coffins.
Available on <skillcolor>standard PvP</c> Settings

<teal2>Destroy Castle</c>
Spend <skillcolor>{countdestroy} Key</c> to permanently destroy the castle.
Available on <skillcolor>merciless PvP</c> Settings

<teal2>Claim Castle</c>
Spend <skillcolor>{countclaim} Keys</c> to seize control of the castle.
Available on <skillcolor>merciless PvP</c> Settings

By accessing a <teal2>Level 1 Enemy Castle Heart</c> you can spend <teal2>1 Bone Castle key</c> to destroy the castle or spend <teal2>3 Bone Castle keys</c> to seize control of the castle.\n\n<red1>This item can only be used on servers that allow destruction and/or seizing of enemy castles.</c>

A dangerous spell-caster in tune with the more ephemeral qualities of nature. Mairwyn speaks to the winds, which whisper for change, chaos, and destruction. However, she seems content to only massacre those who wander too close to her Grove.

An unparalleled genius in the explosive arts. Unfortunately for Grayson, this chaotic psychopath is far too useful to get rid of at providing and mixing destructive materials. Heâ€™ll burn down his entire camp just to take you with him, laughing all the while.

An adept but undisciplined archer, she lets her arrows fly and trusts that fate knows where to take them, and it works. Lidia is a force of chaos that cannot be contained, and the bandit king is happy to let her do as she likes as long as it benefits him.

A cold-hearted bandit lieutenant, she oversees the animal husbandry and leather tanning camp in Farbane. Once a member of the Dunley militia, she was removed from her position for her brutal battlefield decision-making. Aside from being a crack shot, her enchanted arrows rain down icy death.

A lieutenant of the bandit forces charged with looking over the logging camp. Just because heâ€™s an expert woodworker doesnâ€™t mean he doesnâ€™t know his way around a crossbow, though. He didnâ€™t rise up in the bandit ranks for nothing.

A brutal mining foreman, just as adept at crushing stone as he is crushing bone. Not even his incredible eye for recovering and refining metals was enough to stop him from getting run out of civilised society. His violent rage makes a fine motivator for the miners.

The â€˜Kingâ€™ of the bandits, once heralded as a hero of the common people in Dunley. His lack of proper reverence for the Church of Luminance saw him driven into Farbane, where his prowess in battle earned the respect of the banditry and, eventually, a place as their champion and king. He may have been a good man, once.
Unit that yields <teal1>Grave Dust</c>, chance for <teal1>Scourgestone</c> and <teal1>Spectral Dust</c>.

A legendary vampire from the age of Dracula. He was one of only a handful of loyalists bold enough to be well beyond enemy lines when the barrier of darkness was erected over Farbane. Thinking himself abandoned by his allies to the forces of humanity, he has not since forgotten this betrayal.

A mad cultist, too far gone to be really intelligible. The malevolent being they serve pushes them to desecrate all things, with little regard for practicality. They wear a rotting pigâ€™s head as a decorative mask.

There are few creatures on the face of Vardoran as ancient as Leandra. Some say whatever dark power she acts as a conduit for simply refuses to let her pass into death. Some whispers, quieter and less daring, suggest she was once one of Draculaâ€™s most trusted advisors.
A blacksmith defends your castle against intruders and unlocks new recipes on the Anvil and the Furnace. You only need one blacksmith in your castle.

A fanatical servant of the Church of Luminance, his blind faith in the Light makes him the perfect candidate for Overseer of the Silver Mines. He is willing to look past the vile actions of the church, and even enforce them if itâ€™s in the interest of what he believes is the greater good. Even if it means doing something he might never condone, such as forced labor, or exiling his beloved daughter.

Once a fiercely loyal warrior in Draculaâ€™s army. Itâ€™s said he went mad after the vampire lordâ€™s defeat, amputating his sword arm in shame for his failure to protect his master. In a haze from blood loss, he wandered into the wilderness to die. The corruption of the Cursed Forest gave him not death, but something much worse.

Cursed with eternal life and servitude to the Cult of the Damned, Cyril has little desire to perform his duties. However, having been traded to the Cult before he had even been born, this tortured life is all he knows. Resigned to his fate, he does still take some small joy in inflicting his pain on others.

This old survivalist seeked to explore the Cursed Forest, despite knowing its dangers. As the curse began to cloud his mind, he found ways to fight against it. With his cloak and a helpful little wisp heâ€™d captured in a lantern, his strange magical defense prevented the curse from taking full control. Though it was too late to prevent his mind from falling to tatters, he still does what he does bestâ€¦ survive.

This mother bear is said to be ancient. Rumour has it that she wears a scar from every Bandit King that has ever lived, a rite of passage for the position. Her life stands as testament to the fact that no bandit leader has ever done well enough to finish the job.

Farmers try to be diligent in keeping their pest problems under control, as legend says that any place too infested might find themselves visited by the Putrid Rat. No one is quite sure how it gets in, but they know it by the stench of rotting flesh and its carnivorous appetite.
A giant deadly putrid rat. The blood of this rat could be useful...

A faithful servant of the Church of Luminance with a mean streak, Christina serves as both a den mother to acolytes as well as a stern disciplinarian. Every young priest or nun knows not to cross her.

A stalwart champion of law and order in Dunley, itâ€™s his mission to protect the common people with his chilling gifts. Some say his methods have been getting more harsh and violent ever since his sister was banished.

The result of a long line of earth speakers, Terah resides up in the solitude of the mountains among sparkling gem veins and rugged boulders. Despite her stoic appearance and demeanour, communing with the spirits of nature has driven her quite insane.
Unit that yields <teal1>Bones</c>, chance for <teal1>Grave Dust</c>.
Unit that yields <teal1>Rugged Hides</c>, chance for low grade <teal1>Seeds</c>

A true artist with a deep love for the process of creation. She thinks of herself much like she thinks of her glass. It is beautiful and practical, chaotic and tame, strong and yet delicate. In the same way, her style of glassblowing is methodical and daring. While she is a master of her craft, she wears many savage burn scars for her haphazard approach.

The trusted Right Hand of Doctor Henry Blackbrew, Voltatia is responsible for the maintenance and protection of the entire electric pipeline of Gloomrot, providing the region with their much needed energy supply. A stern professional and born leader, Voltatia operates with psychotic efficiency, and has little emotional desire beyond keeping The Doctorâ€™s operation running smoothly.

The most dangerous of her kind, and fiercely protective of her tribe. Itâ€™s said that the harpies are attracted to only the finest gemstones, and none has a sharper eye for quality than the matriarch herself. Wealthy folk are warned to keep their jewels out of sight if they dare travel outside the protection of Brighthaven.

The beloved head engineer of weapons at the Machine Factory, Ziva is the embodiment of perfectly delightful destruction. Truly in love with her deadly experiments, she is always at the forefront at pushing for greater means of bringing a suitably painful and spectacular death to whoever ends up on the wrong end of her unstable technology. Which end often changes from trigger pull to trigger pull.

A creature that was once one of Draculaâ€™s favourite pets. The monster mourned the death of its master in a blood-soaked vigil, enduring the toxic, bloody rains that followed Draculaâ€™s death for seven days and seven nights. This is the mangled monstrosity that emerged.

The head and heart of the Dunley Monastery and a true believer in the Light, Raziel is known for his persuasive sermons and harsh, fire-and-brimstone rhetoric. It is believed that his holy power is granted by his incredible righteousness, largely because he keeps saying so.

An old soldier and a veteran of many battles, Octavian is perhaps the most trusted man in all of Dunley. The militia serves him without question, and he in turn serves them to the best of his ability. Donâ€™t let his age fool you, heâ€™s got plenty of fight left in him.

Meredith is a true believer in the Church of Luminance, and believes that her power, a gift from the Light, she has a responsibility to wield against dark forces. As brave as she is naive, she is so unafraid to stare into the light that it blinds her. She knows only the pursuit of justice at any cost.

The culmination of Doctor Henry Blackbrewâ€™s brilliance, The Monster was to be the next step of human evolution, the ultimate machine of war. It is as powerful as Blackbrew could have ever desired but proved impossible to control. The Trancendum has done everything it can to contain The Monster, and theyâ€™ve been successful in doing soâ€¦ for now.

The patriarch of a family that once held land when these swamps were adequately inhabited. Over time, the cursed land twisted them, leaving this horrible, twisted toad that only remembers its lust for gold and jewels. It jealously guards its hoard of forgotten, worthless currency.
Unit that yields <teal1>Pristine Hide</c>, spawns with a random blood type.

A legendary paladin of the Light, and the oldest living member of the Church of Luminance. His connection to the Light has extended his lifetime seemingly indefinitely, and heâ€™s watched the steady descent of man down the path of comfort, greed, and avarice with disinterest. A pioneer of the age of heroes, he yearns for the days of glory to return and cares for little else.

A dedicated servant of the Trancendum, Angram was an exterminator that possessed a natural cruelty and resilience unmatched by any of his peers. Like any good soldier, he gave his life for his causeâ€¦ or tried to, anyway. Doctor Henry Blackbrew could not let such an asset go to waste and brought him back to life with a brutal surgery few other beings could survive. Angram lives now, at the mere cost of every last scrap of his humanity.

A brilliant, obsessive scholar that resides in an ancient family library, discovering its long-lost secrets in pursuit of a goal intuitively passed through her familyâ€™s bloodline. The culmination of generations of work is at her ink-stained fingertipsâ€¦ to open a way to the world of demons.

A truly impressive strategic mind in life, Kriig saw an early end for his mistaken faith in his allies. Though he was sent to an unjust grave, he was like any great mastermind, and had contingencies in place for just such an occasion. A dark deal with an entity of undeath allowed him to rise again and take his revenge. Now he serves the Cult of the Damned with renewed purpose, fully immersing himself into their enigmatic cause.
Unit that yields <teal1>Bones</c>, chance for <teal1>Scourgestone</c> and <teal1>Grave Dust</c>.

Formerly a traveling swordsman-for-hire, the good baron earned his title of Grand Sommelier after winning a tasting contest hosted by the Church of Luminance. His abilities were so extraordinary, itâ€™s said that he can name the ingredients, their ages, and their place of origin with only a sip of brew. Though his new position offers him all the worldly goods he could desire, those who know him well suspect he may miss the taste of blood on the tip of his blade most of all.

A massive spider of legendary age and progeny. The Spider Queen resides in the twisted, web-woven depths of Cursed Forestâ€™s winding caverns. No living creature save for her children has ever entered and lived to tell the tale.

The working arm and logistical mastermind of the bandit forces, Grayson is the backbone of their operation. As the quartermaster of a band of chaotic outlaws, murderers, and thieves, heâ€™s the stern voice of reason that keeps their gang well fed and well equipped.

The most talented tailor in all of Vardoran, but no one is without a skeleton in their closet. Though the legacy of Draculaâ€™s blood runs through her veins, she has proven far more charming than dangerous.

Doctor Henry Blackbrew was once humankindâ€™s last hope against the forces of Dracula, before the Church of Luminance came along. With their newly found faith and weapons of light, mankind turned on the Doctor for his sick methodology and pursuit of human evolution, declaring him a heretic. Banished alongside his students, he went on to found The Trancendum and began constructing a society in his image. With the help of a resource he refers to as â€œBlood Type Eâ€ heâ€™s managed to maintain his youth, and keep his twisted pursuit of â€œprogressâ€ alive for well over 800 years.

A true politician, Azariel wormed his way to the top of the ranks of the Church of Luminance with cold, calculated social grace. Few can match his power and dedication to the Light short of Solarus the Immaculate himself, and none within the church would dare contradict his word.

Once a formidable swordsman and legendary graverobber, Bane was caught by the Cult of the Damned during one of his many heists. Seeing the benefit of his talent for infiltration, instead of killing him, they corrupted him into a servant of undeath. Itâ€™s said that his clandestine abilities were crucial in the capture and corruption of the Iron Mine over the Militia.

A necromancer driven out of high society in Silverlight for his indulgence in the dark arts. Now he lives among the undead, using his unliving servants to fulfil his needs, as well as bring him back unwilling subjects for his experiments.

A cold-blooded killer, and the scion of a long line of vampire hunters. Few are as prepared to face the rising tide of the vampire threat as Tristan, and his drive to exterminate the last of the unholy threat is second to none.

Originally an engineer responsible for advancements in practical electrical weapons, Dominaâ€™s incredible advancements were born of her hands-on, reckless approach to testing. Though this approach led to her demise, she was brought back to life by the maddening machinery of the infamous Doctor Henry Blackbrew. Dominaâ€™s sadism and masochism are unlimited, unmatched, and perhaps unstoppable in her pursuit of protecting and â€œpolicingâ€ the people of Gloomrot.
An unspeakable horror that lurks in the snowy corridors of the Hallowed Mountains. Some say it used to be a simple woodsman. Most donâ€™t dare invoke its name at all.

None of the werewolves asked for this curse, but what makes Willfred dangerous is that he embraces it. He is the chief of the werewolf village not just for his ferocity, but the way he embodies the carnivorous terror of his twisted little village.

An honored and deeply respected chief of a small, reclusive village of outcasts. Despite the imminent threat of the Cult of the Damned, dangerous wildlife, and even the rumor of Werewolves stalking northern Dunley, he manages to keep his people fed and happy.

A powerful psychopomp that taps into mysterious spiritual sources. Polora is one of the only known mortal links to fairy kind and driven to the brink of sanity by her intimate connection to nature. Her dream-like home is alive with unique, enchanted plant life.

A creature whose story has long since been lost to the ages, though not without resemblance to some few legendary creatures that were once men. One cannot help but wonder what strange corruption has taken root in Vardoran.

Some say Matka is the oldest of the witches, but the truth is that nobody knows how or when these timeless creatures were born. A force of nature and a mockery of humanity, she is utterly beyond reason.

A ferocious apex predator of its kind, many times larger, stronger, and more hostile than its smaller kin. The Alpha Wolf, true to its name, is regarded by others of its kind with absolute authority. They never truly hunt alone.

A mad cultist that claims to be the vessel of his decapitated horse, â€˜Foulrot the Soultaker.â€™ He also claims his blades take their victims straight to hell, an effort to feed or please some infernal power. Whether or not thereâ€™s truth to his claims, his headcount is undeniable.

A huntress from a noble house in Brighthaven, famous for their development of new-age weaponry. Sheâ€™s dedicated her life to hunting down the legendary vampire â€˜Styxâ€™ and stole an impressive arsenal of experimental weapons to carry out her vengeance.

This testing period will be under strict NDA, which means there will be ABSOLUTELY NO STREAMING, RECORDING, OR SCREENSHOTS, OR SHARING TEST CONTENT DETAILS OF ANY KIND. Purpose This agreement is made to protect the confidential information Stunlock Studios shares with you during the preparations for the V Rising BETA test, during the actual BETA test, and all the communication that will follow, as well as all other cooperation, to prevent any damage that could be caused to the company by leakage of such information. Definition of Confidential Information 'Confidential Information' means any information or data relating to V Rising's BETA test, and shall include, but not limited to: a)Ideas, trade secrets, trademarks, know-how, analysis, methods, source code, concepts, assets, and documents. b)Video footage recordings, screenshots, audio recordings, and all forms of media that include V Rising's BETA test, documentation related to it, or communication between you and the company regarding the test. Confidentiality Obligation You shall keep the Confidential Information in confidence and shall not publish, disclose, distribute, transmit, post, or otherwise make available, directly or indirectly, any Confidential Information to any third party. Remedies You understand and agree that the Confidential Information is a valuable asset in Stunlock Studios' business and that the disclosure of the same third party in breach of this Agreement will cause Stunlock Studios irreparable harm. You, therefore, agree that Stunlock Studios shall be entitled to claim appropriate injunctive relief in a court of law if a breach of this Agreement is made by you. Permitted Disclosures You may disclose the Confidential Information in accordance with a judicial or governmental order; provided, however, that you give Stunlock Studios prompt written notice of such order so Stunlock Studios has the opportunity to seek an appropriate protective order or another remedy to protect the Company. You agree to only disclose as much Confidential Information as necessary and to help Stunlock Studios in any way possible to minimise the harm made to the company. Any other disclosure is a breach of this Agreement without the written consent of such disclosure from Stunlock Studios. Governing Law and Jurisdiction Laws This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Sweden. Arbitration Any dispute, controversy, or claim arising out of, or in connection with, this Agreement, or the breach, termination, or invalidity of the Agreement, shall be settled by arbitration in accordance with the rules of Expedited Arbitration of the Arbitration Institute of the Stockholm Chamber of Commerce. The place of arbitration shall be Gothenburg, Sweden. The language to be used in the arbitral proceedings shall be English, if not otherwise agreed between the Parties. Confidentiality The Parties undertake and agree that all arbitral proceedings conducted with reference to this arbitration clause will be kept strictly confidential. This confidentiality undertaking shall cover all information disclosed in the course of such arbitral proceedings, as well as any decision or award that is made or declared during the proceedings. Information covered by this confidentiality undertaking may not, in any form, be disclosed to a third party without the written consent of the other Party. This notwithstanding, a Party shall not be prevented from disclosing such information in order to safeguard in the best possible way his rights regarding the other Party in connection with the dispute, or if the Party is obliged to so disclose pursuant to statute, regulation, a decision by an authority, a stock exchange contract or similar.
